mapper.insert: insert into `order` (order_name, order_price, order_time, order_userid, order_gameid, order_status) values (#{cartName},#{cartPrice},#{orderTime},#{cartUserid},#{cartGameid},'0');
mapper.select: select order_id,order_name,order_time,order_price,game_img from `order` join game on `order`.order_gameid = game.game_id where order_userid = #{orderUserid} and order_status = '1' order by order_time desc
select order_name, order_gameid, game_img from `order` join game on `order`.order_gameid = game.game_id where order_userid = #{orderUserid} and order_status = '1' group by order_name
mapper.update: update `order` set order_status = '1' where order_gameid = #{gameid} and order_userid = #{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from `order` where order_gameid = #{gameId} and order_userid = #{userId}
mapper.select: select * from `order` where order_gameid = #{orderGameid} and order_userid = #{orderUserid} and order_status = '1'
